title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.26 - Car safeties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.26 - Car safeties

State Regulations

In factory buildings erected before or after

October 1, 1913; in mercantile establishments in buildings erected before or
after November 1, 1920. All elevator cars, the travel of which exceeds 25 feet, shall be equipped with a safety device of an approved type, attached to the car
frame beneath the platform or on the car beam. Exception: Dumbwaiters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-2.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
